review:
Doctor has been very professional and her expertise in the diagnosis is really commendable.
Thank you once again for your outstanding care and for going above and beyond to ensure the best possible outcome for your patients. Your commitment to excellence is deeply appreciated Doctor Renu!
Do tor was v friendly and accomadative. Gave effective medication by which we were cured in just a day.
Dr Renu was very open to listening my issue and took a clear history before suggesting any treatment course. Would recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have been consulting with Dr. Renu multiple times for issues like abscess, fever, diarrhoea etc 

She was always very patient, approachable, responsive and helped me recover. 

One time I was away in a trek in Himalayas in a remote place around Manali and had to video call her with my health issue. She took care of me very warmly for days because I had no access to medicines or doctors and helped me recover. Even after I got back home, she checked in on me to help with my recovery and advised. 

I owe her one for everything she did
Doctor is friendly and provides point to point explanation of the disorder. Doctor is polite. Recommend
Doctor Renu is excellent on the assesment. She understood the problems throughly. ********* ********* ***** *** ********** She gives good amount of time to each patient. Happy with the consultation

Consulted for fever, cough and body pain. We hadn’t expected it to be dengue but doctor recommended a dengue test and it turned out to be dengue! We did the follow up consultation on the phone which the doctor readily agreed to. The report showed inordinate levels of HbA1c which she also discussed and laid out some recommendation about.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been going to Dr. Renu on multiple occasions since last year and I have been very happy with the service and the diagnosis. Highly recommended!

Diagnosis was excellent. You get to know her experience with the right questions she asks and tells you accurately why it could have happened. Very nice experience. Excellent treatment. Will finish the course of medicine and will be able to tell you better. Thank you doctor.

review: In the list of services, It is mentioned nonsurgical piles treatment available, *** ****** ***** ** *** **** ***** ** *** ********* ** *****.
